name: Cod Steamed With Mushrooms
keywords: cod, fish, portobello, shiitake, white mushrooms, fall, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 cup mushroom broth (reserved from ragout recipe above)

recipeInstructions.text: Warm the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the cod, sprinkle with salt and pepper and cook for 3 minutes. Add the broth. Spread the mushroom ragout evenly over the fillets. Reduce heat, cover and simmer until the fish is completely cooked, 8 to 10 minutes.
